com.fs.starfarer.api.combat

Interface CombatNebulaAPI


  • public interface CombatNebulaAPI
    Covers the map plus a 100 pixel area around it.
    Author:
    Alex Mosolov Copyright 2016 Fractal Softworks, LLC
